extension.summary: Spotimc gives you access to the Spotify music service.
extension.description: Spotimc lets you search for music, browse your playlists and play your favourite tunes right from XBMC.[CR][CR]This product uses SPOTIFY(R) CORE but is not endorsed, certified or otherwise approved in any way by Spotify. Spotify is the registered trade mark of the Spotify Group.[CR][CR]Special thanks to Seeleck for the logo and skin improvements.[CR][CR]Special thanks also for the CherryPy project, the DejaVu fonts project and the GNOME project (high contrast icons theme).
extension.disclaimer: It requires a Spotify premium account.
